credit_line: Gift of Susan W. and Stephen D. Paine, Class of 1954
title: Old Views Melt Into the New Morning Blossom
inscriptions: in image c.r. in ink: NOWACK 1966; verso c. in paint: OLD VIEWS MELT INTO/ THE NEW MORNING BLOSSOM/ Wayne Nowack July 8, 1966/ North Hollywood, Calif.; verso u.r.: [typed notice to carrier,packer and shipper with instructions on handling with signature of artist in pencil]; verso u.c. collection label: [Paine collection]; verso on collection label u.r. in ink: Best to Steve and Susan:/ Wayne/ Nowack
